opportunities.title: Support for technology innovation - National Research Council Canada
opportunities.description: The National Research Council of Canada Industrial Research Assistance Program (NRC IRAP) provides advice, connections, and funding to help Canadian small and medium-sized businesses increase their innovation capacity and take ideas to market. Discover how we can help your small or medium-sized business drive growth through innovation and technology. Learn about our extensive network of resources and the valuable expertise of our industrial technology advisors. Find out if your business is eligible for financial support through NRC IRAP and how to connect with us.

opportunities.title: NRC IRAP (Industrial Research Assistance Program)
opportunities.description: To qualify for NRC IRAP funding, your business must: Be incorporated and profit-oriented in Canada. Have fewer than 500 full-time employees. Be engaged in the development and commercialization of innovative, technology-driven products, services, ...

opportunities.title: Evaluation of the NRC’s Industrial Research Assistance Program - National Research Council Canada
opportunities.description: NRC IRAP contributes funding to eligible firms and organizations through three primary streams. Regular IRAP is the main funding stream supporting clients with awards between $50,000 and $1M. The accelerated review process (ARP) supports small projects below $50,000.

opportunities.title: Scientific research and experimental development tax credit - Province of British Columbia
opportunities.description: Home/Taxes and tax credits/Income taxes/Corporate income tax/Tax credits/Scientific research and experimental development ... The scientific research and experimental development (SR&ED) tax credit is for qualifying corporations that carry on SR&ED in B.C.

opportunities.title: About the Canada Digital Adoption Program (CDAP)
opportunities.description: The Canada Digital Adoption Program is no longer accepting new applications. CDAP offers two grants that will help you get online and use technology to build your business.

tax_incentives.title: Scientific Research and Experimental Development (SR&ED) tax incentives - Canada.ca
tax_incentives.description: Claimants should submit their SR&ED claim with their income tax return for the year.

tax_incentives.title: What work is eligible - Scientific Research and Experimental Development (SR&ED) tax incentives - Canada.ca
tax_incentives.description: Learn about the requirements for SR&ED eligibility, including what types of research and development work qualify for tax incentives and what is excluded. Get support through self-assessment tools, pre-claim consultations, and guidelines.

tax_incentives.title: Scientific Research and Experimental Development (SR&ED) tax incentives - Canada.ca
tax_incentives.description: The Scientific Research and Experimental Development (SR&ED) tax incentive program lets Canadian businesses earn tax incentives that can reduce their income tax payable.

tax_incentives.title: What are SR&ED tax incentives - Scientific Research and Experimental Development (SR&ED) tax incentives - Canada.ca
tax_incentives.description: If your business is engaged in scientific research and experimental development (SR&ED), you may be able to earn tax incentives that reduce your income tax payable.

tax_incentives.title: Line 41200 – Investment tax credit - Canada.ca
tax_incentives.description: You can carry forward credits earned in tax years ending after 1997 for up to 20 years by filling in Part F of Form T2038(IND) and filing it with your paper return. You may be able to claim a refund of your unused ITCs. For more information, go to Line 45400 – Refund of investment tax credit.

tax_incentives.title: Clean Technology Manufacturing Investment Tax Credit - Canada.ca
tax_incentives.description: The Clean Technology Manufacturing ITC, also known as CTM, is a refundable tax credit to encourage the investment of capital for clean technology manufacturing and processing, as well as critical mineral extraction and processing in Canada from January 1, 2024, to December 31, 2034.

quick_wins.title: Boost Your Business Technology Grant | Get up to $15,000
quick_wins.description: Propel your business forward. Find the right technologies for your business and build a digital adoption plan with a grant of up to $15,000.

quick_wins.title: Canada Digital Adoption Program (CDAP)
quick_wins.description: Businesses with a signed grant agreement to CDAP’s Boost Your Business Technology stream prior to February 19, 2024 may be eligible to receive a grant2 to build their digital plan, followed by a 0% loan of up to $100,0001 to implement it.

quick_wins.title: Ontario Grants - Digital Main Street
quick_wins.description: is focused on providing one-on-one assistance to small businesses in any region of Ontario. It will include training, advisory support, and a grant to support the Digital Service Squads across Ontario.

quick_wins.title: Programs for Ontario buisnesses - Digital Main Street
quick_wins.description: Ontario Grants Program: provided brick-and-mortar small businesses with $2,500 Digital Transformation Grants, and municipalities / local communities with grants to implement a Digital Service Squad.

quick_wins.title: Google for Startups Accelerator: Canada
quick_wins.description: A ten-week accelerator program for high potential Seed to Series A tech startups based in Canada.

quick_wins.title: Programs - Google for Startups
quick_wins.description: From Accelerator to our Funds, discover the Google for Startups programs that can help your business move forward.

quick_wins.title: Alberta Innovates — Micro Voucher Program | Program Guide 2025
quick_wins.description: Companies registered and operating in Alberta, Canada. The evaluation and selection of projects for the Micro Voucher Program are conducted based on various business and technical factors to ensure alignment with the program's objectives of technological advancement and economic growth for Alberta.

quick_wins.title: Productivity and Innovation Voucher Program | Invest Nova Scotia, Canada
quick_wins.description: The Productivity and Innovation Voucher Program (PIVP) is your path to access post-secondary institution research and resources. It helps small- and medium-sized companies access expertise within post-secondary institutions to improve productivity, develop a new product, service, or process, ...
